alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 9:11PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phelps, west central Kearney and southwestern Buffalo Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 907 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holdrege, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Funk around 920 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 262 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
